text: The Stadio Libero Liberati is a multi-use stadium in Terni, Italy. It is currently used mostly for football matches and the home of Ternana Unicusano Calcio. The stadium was built in 1969 and holds 17,460.http://www.lanazione.it/umbria/sport/calcio/2012/09/13/771698-liberati_agibile.shtml The stadium was named after Libero Liberati, a motorcycle racer who died in 1962. ==References== Libero Liberati Category:Terni Category:Ternana Calcio Category:Sports venues in Umbria Libero
title: Stadio Libero Liberati
